function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential delay of infrastructure projects","Impact":"Extra costs, risk of organization liquidation","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures, adapt to new ways of working","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, health monitoring technology","People":"Staff members, decision-makers","Owner":"Infrastructure sector organizations"},{"Description":"Limited generalizability of research results","Impact":"Limited value for decision-making, lack of applicability to other contexts","Mitigation":"Conduct further research, consider similar developed countries","Technologies":"Research and data analysis tools","People":"Decision-makers, researchers","Owner":"Research organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of communication and employee well-being considerations","Impact":"Decreased morale, lack of business-employee alignment","Mitigation":"Increase communication, prioritize employee well-being","Technologies":"Communication platforms, employee well-being monitoring tools","People":"Organizational leaders, employees","Owner":"Organizational leaders"}]}
